name: Leather Recliner Sofa
description: Luxury leather recliner with cup holders and adjustable headrest.
details: This premium leather recliner features top-grain leather upholstery, power reclining mechanism, USB charging port, and built-in cup holders. The adjustable headrest and lumbar support ensure maximum comfort for extended periods.
materials: Top-grain leather, solid wood frame, high-density foam

name: Convertible Sofa Bed
description: Space-saving sofa that converts into a bed, with storage compartment.
details: This versatile sofa bed transforms from a comfortable sofa to a full-size bed in seconds. The hidden storage compartment provides additional space for blankets, pillows, or other items.
materials: Fabric upholstery, solid wood frame, high-density foam

name: Queen Size Bed
description: Modern wooden platform bed frame with headboard.
details: This elegant queen-size platform bed features a modern design with a wooden headboard and sturdy construction. The low-profile design creates a clean, contemporary look in any bedroom.
materials: Solid pine wood, engineered wood, metal hardware

name: Memory Foam Mattress
description: Queen-size memory foam mattress with cooling gel technology.
details: Experience ultimate comfort with this queen-size memory foam mattress. The cooling gel technology helps regulate temperature while you sleep, and the memory foam contours to your body for optimal support.
materials: Memory foam, cooling gel, hypoallergenic cover

name: Rustic Wooden Nightstand
description: Handcrafted wooden nightstand with two spacious drawers.
details: This handcrafted wooden nightstand features a rustic design with two spacious drawers for storage. The solid wood construction ensures durability and longevity.

name: Glass Coffee Table
description: Stylish glass coffee table with chrome legs.
details: This elegant glass coffee table features a tempered glass top with chrome legs. The modern design adds a touch of sophistication to any living room.

name: Velvet Accent Chair
description: Elegant velvet armchair with gold legs, perfect for living rooms.
details: This elegant velvet accent chair features a luxurious velvet upholstery with gold-finished legs. The comfortable design makes it perfect for reading corners or as a statement piece in your living room.
materials: Velvet upholstery, solid wood frame, gold-finished metal legs

name: Wall Art Canvas Set
description: 3-piece modern abstract wall art set for home decor.
details: This 3-piece modern abstract wall art set adds a touch of sophistication to any room. The high-quality canvas prints feature vibrant colors and contemporary designs.

name: Modern Bookshelf
description: Tall wooden bookshelf with five open shelves and a cabinet.
details: This modern bookshelf features five open shelves and a cabinet with doors. The versatile design provides ample storage space for books, decorative items, and more.

name: Bar Stool Set
description: Set of 2 adjustable-height bar stools with cushioned seats.
details: This set of 2 bar stools features adjustable height and cushioned seats for comfort. The modern design adds a touch of sophistication to your kitchen or bar area.
materials: Metal frame, cushioned seat, faux leather upholstery
